price: 24. Qhuraan ma-cubbusaana innaa hinnak ken sorkocobbaxittet koflitte tanniih (alifu taniih)?
arabic: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ أَمۡ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبٍ أَقۡفَالُهَآ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: afalā yatadabbarūna al-qur'āna am ʿalā qulūbin aqfāluhā
